text: Absolutely loved this book! It's a masterpiece that's both captivating and emotionally driven.
This book was a fantastic read! Highly recommend to anyone who loves epic sagas.
Really struggled to finish this book. Not what I was hoping for at all.
Great thriller with lots of twists. Kept me on the edge of my seat!
Too slow for my taste. The story didn't hold my interest.
A brilliant crime novel. Perfectly paced with a plot that keeps you guessing.
Not as thrilling as I expected. The mystery was too easily solved.
An epic story that I couldn't put down. The characters were deep and memorable.
I found it underwhelming. Lacked the depth and detail I look for in historical epics.
